snippet: Andrea Bruce, a freelance photographer for The New York Times and a member of the Noor photo agency , has won the the first Getty Images and Chris Hondros Fund Award. Dominic Bracco II was a finalist.
abstract: Andrea Bruce, a freelance photographer for The New York Times and a member of the Noor photo agency , has won the the first Getty Images and Chris Hondros Fund Award. Dominic Bracco II was a finalist.

headline.main: Andrea Bruce Wins First Chris Hondros Award
